summary: An ordinance accepting an easement and waiver of damages from the owners of the property abutting on Rainier Avenue, from the north margin of Lucile Street to a point approximately 235 feet northerly therefrom, for the regrading of the easterly portion of Rainier Avenue between said limits and a waiver of damages to said abutting property by reason of said regrading, and the making of the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon said property.
